page.title: 14Framlingham's social life.
page.content: Besides the Sports Club(see p13) there is a bowls club beside the castle, which dates back to and a fishing club. Much sport is played at the schools including minor county cricket at Framlingham college. The sports hall at Thomas Mills High School offers judo and keep-fit. Table tennis,darts,bridge and snooker are other indoor games. There is a teenage youth club in the Â£Shalom Centre'besides church clubs. There are scouts,cubs and guides and, until this year, brownies. There is an army cadet force. The British Legion turns out a full parade each year and meets regularly. St. Johns Ambulance Brigade has flourishing adult and junior sections. F.A.D.S.(Framlingham Amateur and Dramatic Society) puts on two productions each year. St. Michaels Church is often the venue of musical concerts by local and other groups.
